shortDescription: On Seowon Intech routers, there is a Command Injection vulnerability in diagnostic.cgi via shell metacharacters in the ping_ipaddr parameter.
vulnerabilityName: seowonintech swr-300a_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
